description: Type 1: apply this promotion to all items
Type 2: discount applies to specific items
Type 3: buy N items of one type of item get another item percentage off
Type 4: buy 2 different  items get ONE percentage off
Type 5: get an exact of N dollar amount  off
Type 6: get the amount of dollar off if order over the required amount
Type 7: get free shipping for specific items
Type 8: get free shipping if the order is over the required amount
Type 9: get a flat dollar amount off when collecting enough N points
